content: अधीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not bold, timid. {@--2@} Confused, lacking self-command, excited, excitable. {@--3@} Fitful, capricious. {@--4@} Unsteady, not fixed, tremulous, rolling; °विप्रेक्षितमायताक्ष्या <ls>Ku. 1. 46</ls>; °लोचनः <ls>Śi. 1. 53</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">6. 25.</ls> {@--5@} Querulous, foolish, weak-minded. --रा {@--1@} Lightning. {@--2@} A capricious or quarrelsome mistress; see under नायिका.
